maintainer.name: Perses
notes: Clean flash is recommended if coming from another ROM
GApps are included in the build

warning: Flashing custom ROMs may void your warranty. Make sure to backup your data before proceeding.

items: Cleanup OMX Dependencies for latest sources
sepolicy: Remove duplicate snxxx AIDL rules
Disable Chimera.GmsIntentOperationService and Disable collective Device administrators GMS components
Many more under-the-hood fixes and optimizations

steps: Take a backup of your current ROM (optional but recommended)
